text: Leptophryne is a small genus of true toads. There are only two species. They are found in southeast Asia, in Peninsular Thailand through the Malay Peninsula. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Leptophryne borbonica Java Tree Toad; Bourbon Toad Leptophryne cruentata Indonesia Tree Toad ==Other websites== * . 2007.
